entities.name: diagon alley
entities.description: Diagon Alley is mentioned as a location where premises are being planned for. It is described as a place in Harry Potter's world where wizards and witches shop.

entities.name: galleons
entities.description: Galleons are mentioned as the currency needed to afford rent on a place in Diagon Alley.

entities.name: mundungus
entities.description: Mundungus is mentioned as someone who might be involved in selling stolen goods or something awful.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who knows that Mundungus hasn't persuaded them to sell stolen goods.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone who is concerned about how they got premises in Diagon Alley.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as someone who is also concerned about how they got premises in Diagon Alley and wonders if Mundungus has persuaded them to sell stolen goods or something awful.

relationships.description: Harry knows that Mundungus hasn't persuaded them to sell stolen goods.
Ron is concerned about how they got premises in Diagon Alley.
Hermione suspects that Mundungus has persuaded them to sell stolen goods or something awful.
Harry is concerned about how they got premises in Diagon Alley.
